Description:
Views Views & More Views
Sometimes some locations Brag it all. Views, size and location, are all things sorted when you purchase lot 62 in Grossmans Ridge.
Perched high in the estate and backing on to farm zone you will appreciate the northern rear and spectacular outlooks over Mount Duneed and Freshwater Creek.
The sizeable 4000sqm allotment is flat and offers all services such as sewer, electricity, gas, water & NBN
Who said you can't have it all?

Description:
PRIVATE VIEWING AVAILABLE - CALL ADAM NATONEWSKI 0419 611 121
Positioned on a rear allotment on a quiet street here is a fantastic opportunity for easy, low maintenance living with all amenities nearby that will make the perfect home for downsizers, young couples and investors alike.
Central to the home is the gorgeous light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining area. Bench space is aplenty in the kitchen which will make food preparation a breeze. Ample cupboard space, dishwasher and pantry further distinguish the kitchen. The master bedroom at the front is accompanied by a spacious walk in robe to the main bathroom. Two remaining bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom. Evaporative cooling and ducted heating channel throughout. Outside, the property offers a single car garage and features a low maintenance backyard with garden beds along the fence, tastefully setting the area for outdoor entertaining.
Positioned within walking distance of the High Street shops, and only minutes away from Deakin University and the Ring Road, the Geelong CBD, Torquay and the rest of the surf coast you are not only assured plenty of things to do, but superb access to all of Geelong's high quality primary and secondary schools. Modern care free living doesn't get any better!
Insights: 2/16 Donald Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Private, secure, and most affordable!
If you are looking for a quiet and private location, you need to look no further we have found your perfect home!
Upon entry you are greeted by the spacious light filled open plan living space incorporating lounge, meals area and a well-equipped kitchen. Sliding doors provide access to the paved north facing courtyard.
The home features 3 generous BRS, main with WIR and ensuite whilst the other 2 BRS are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
The home is comforted with a gas wall heater and S/S air conditioning plus 8 solar panels to help with your power bills. Internal access from a double remote garage offers additional security. Whether you are downsizing, investing or taking your first step into the property market this home caters for all!
Book your inspection now as this property is sure to impress at this price!
Insights: 7 Jackson Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
EXCITING OPPORTUNITY TO SECURE YOUR TORQUAY DREAM
Tucked away quietly on an elevated 707m2 approx. allotment that takes full advantage of the coastal sea-breeze, is this immaculately presented and superbly maintained single level residence in the popular Great Ocean Views estate.
Graced with natural light through broad expansions of glass and neutral colours, the home feels spacious, airy and connected to its natural surroundings.
A flexible floor plan comprises four generous sized bedrooms all with robes, master with his and hers walk in robe and ensuite, central main bathroom, separate laundry with walk in storage plus an open plan kitchen/ meals and living area that leads out to the undercover alfresco area with ocean view. The kitchen offers an island stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage including a great sized walk in pantry with sink.
Add to this a lounge area, multi-purpose room which could be a theatre room or home office, internal access to double garage and additional features including ducted heating, dual blinds in three bedrooms, plantation shutters in master along with established and low maintenance gardens.
The location is fantastic as you are close to reserves, walking tracks, RACV golf course and resort along with some of the Surf Coasts best beaches.
Insights: 5 Springbank Circuit, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal investment
Youll love:
This 599m2 corner allotment with front & rear access is superbly positioned on the Surf Coast Highway at the entrance to Old Torquay.
The locations flexible zoning & excellent exposure making this property ideal for medical or allied health use, as well as other business/commercial opportunities STCA.
Being nestled amongst a range of busy shops & other essential amenities such as schools, childcare centres, public transport & more.
Plus:
The single-level weatherboard home is currently residentially tenanted until August 2020.
It comprises of 3 bedrooms plus the main living room, kitchen/dining area, a sunroom, bathroom, 2 toilets and laundry.
Theres also a 4-car garage (12m x 5.6m) plus lush green lawns & beautiful mature trees.
This fabulous opportunity offers virtually unlimited potential to anyone whos looking to run their business in a high-profile location in Old Torquay!

Description:
LUXURIOUS BEACHSIDE HOME!!
Perfectly positioned in old Torquay and just 200 metres from the beach, this custom-built contemporary residence is immaculately presented and features a light filled large open plan living area pleasantly styled with good taste and full of relaxing ambience. This iconic four-bedroom weatherboard property is a luxurious beachside home.
Showcasing two living zones, the second living area sits adjacent to the childrens wing along with a beautiful family bathroom complete with freestanding bathtub. The master suite with walk in robe and spacious en-suite with dual basin is private and separate from the main hub of the home. The open plan kitchen, study nook, dining and living area feature high ceilings with north facing light flowing freely from the alfresco entertaining deck with electric outdoor awning and landscaped gardens and lawn area.
Boasting double glazed windows, stone bench tops, 900mm oven and cooktop, walk in pantry, sizeable laundry, ducted heating and cooling, plantation blinds, engineered timber flooring, double garage with internal access and roller door access to the rear yard, a generous 581m2 allotment and just steps to Taylor Park and Fishermans Beach, location couldnt get any better. Whether you are looking for a seaside home or holiday property, coastal living has never looked so good. Call today for further information.
Insights: 34 Fischer Street, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Californian Dreaming A Heartbeat From High Street!
Built in 1927, this Californian Bungalow will delight from the very first glance! Enviably set in one of Belmonts finest streets, this peaceful location places you within walking distance to schools and the vibrant High Street shopping precinct!
Both Roslyn P.S and Belmont High School are a short stroll away, while Barwon Valley School is within easy reach. With High Street boasting an abundance of cafes, eateries, boutiques and big-brand stores, you wont have to venture far for a bite to eat or some retail therapy. Public transport is also within close reach, while the tranquil Barwon River is moments away.
The front porch is wonderfully private, while beautifully retained period details are showcased throughout. High ceilings and original polished floorboards grace the elegant interiors, along with decorative leadlight windows and timber paneling. The formal lounge inspires relaxation with an open fireplace and bay window that overlooks the enchanting front garden. The formal dining room also features a fireplace, while flowing through to the kitchen. The kitchen exudes old world charm with granite benchtops, built-in pantry, ASKO dishwasher, and stainless steel SMEG oven and gas cooktop. French doors unite the open plan living/meals zone and generous alfresco deck - creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for both casual living and entertaining guests.
Two large bedrooms with built-in robes complete the downstairs layout, along with the bathroom, shower room, separate toilet and laundry. Upstairs is home to a third bedroom with built-in robes and a versatile study/4th bedroom, which boasts built-in robes and access to the north-facing balcony. Other features inc. ducted heating, alarm system and 7 solar panels. Surrounded by established trees, the charming backyard soaks up the northern sunlight and creates a private oasis for the whole family to enjoy. Citrus trees add fresh additions to your cooking, while the rainwater tank helps to keep your gardens in prime condition. Ample off-street parking includes the long driveway and remote lock-up tandem garage, which accommodates two vehicles and a large workshop area.
When it comes to charming family living, this home is an absolute treat. Inspect without delay!
Insights: 14 Wimmera Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Living That Ticks Every Box!
Whether youre a first homebuyer, savvy investor, or simply looking for a superb location to raise a family, this home will be at the top of your list! The updated interiors will delight, while vehicle access to the north-facing backyard is another huge plus!
Families will appreciate that a variety of schools are within easy reach, including Grovedale West P.S, Grovedale College, and Nazareth Catholic P.S. The walking trails along Waurn Ponds creek are a short stroll away, along with public transport and local parklands. Superior access to the Ring Road and Waurn Ponds Train Station is ideal for Melbourne commuters. The Waurn Ponds Homemaker Centre and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre will leave you wanting nothing, while Deakin University (Waurn Ponds) and Epworth Hospital are only a short drive away.
The interiors exude a fresh ambience with updates over the last two years including freshly painted interiors, new flooring, new window furnishings, and new appliances to the kitchen. An abundance of natural light sweeps through both living zones, creating a beautiful setting for everyday family living. The central lounge inspires relaxation, while the open plan living zone overlooks the north-facing backyard perfect for keeping an eye on little ones as they play! The kitchen features a large built-in pantry, breakfast bar, and Ariston stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). The sun-drenched outdoor entertaining zone sets the scene for lively gatherings with loved ones. This elevated zone overlooks the generous lawn area, where established hedges create privacy.
Zone to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, laundry, and separate toilet. The front study is ideal for students and home business owners alike. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, two split-system air conditioners, and ceiling fans. The remote double lock-up garage features rear access to the backyard.
Ticking every box for a terrific family lifestyle, youll need to act swiftly to secure this Grovedale gem! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Flat corner block potential in established Highton.
A rare opportunity to obtain a flat corner block that has a variety of options, is close to sought after parkland and is right in the heart of Highton. Surrounded by the wealth of quality education Highton is renowned for, you are only a few minutes' walk from Bellaire Primary, Highton Primary and Christian College, whilst still remaining within moments of the prized Highton Village, the convenience of the Porter Avenue shops and Barrabool Hills shopping plaza. Offering three spacious bedrooms all featuring built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet. The generous living space is the centre piece of the home, sun soaked and featuring polished floorboards, you are provided an ideal family retreat to bask in the northerly aspect. Adjacent to the living, the dining area accompanies the updated kitchen and features stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. To the rear of the 680m2 (approx.) allotment, the property features an oversized, single lock up garage that can also provide space for a workshop, plus a separate garden shed.
An exciting opportunity for investors, developers and first homeowners alike, this property is sure to be popular with a wide variety. Be sure to organise your private inspection today.
Currently tenanted at $370 per week.

Description:
FAMILY HOME ON A DESIRED RESERVE LOCATION!
Set on a sizeable yet private 702m2 (approx.) allotment, this appealing 4-bedroom residence backs onto native Deep Creek reserve. The property is surrounded by a beautifully maintained blend of neat gardens, retaining walls, grassed areas, fire pit zone and an expansive deck to entertain and take in the magnificent sunsets over Deep Creek.
Built over two levels beginning with a welcoming entry, 3 good sized bedrooms two with walk in robes, the third with a built in robe, family bathroom, laundry and second living room with direct access to a deck and stairs leading to the rear yard, complete the first level. The upper level houses a well-equipped and sizeable kitchen, dining and living with a large partially covered balcony, perfect for entertaining, this area boasts fabulous ocean views and a peaceful outlook over Deep Creek Reserve. The master bedroom with walk in robe and en-suite, powder room and study nook area with a north facing balcony, the perfect sunny spot to enjoy the early morning cup of tea complete the upper level.
This property has many attractive features including timber floorboards, high ceilings, a 680mm gas cook top, gas log fire set into a delightful mantel, 3 x Reverse Cycle Air Conditioners. There are plenty of storage options as well as under stair storage area and ceiling fans in all bedrooms.
Outside there is a 4m x 6m (approx.) shed complete with concrete floor and power, veggie boxes, water tank, cubby house, under house storage space and double lock up garage providing internal access with well-established, easy to maintain front and rear gardens.
Direct access to Deep Creek Reserve walking track at the back allows a short stroll to The Esplanade, Fishermans Beach, Whites Beach, Bowls Club, and Gilbert Street precinct, the world famous Great Ocean Road on your doorstep and within easy reach to the ring road for Melbourne commuters, an inspection is a must. Dont delay your inspection of this very well-located property as they are hard to find!

Description:
Saratoga Sanctuary Family Home And Entertainer
The Feel:
Set within beautifully landscaped & secluded gardens, this family home is just steps to the Village Park & town. From the 8-person swim spa set amongst Balinese-inspired gardens, to the tranquility of time spent beneath the shade of the Moonah Tree in the backyard, relaxed coastal living starts the moment you arrive. This spacious coastal allotment includes a separate studio for extra accommodation, complete with a kitchenette & powder room, while the main house is move-in ready with a bright future for renovation or extension (STCA).
The Facts:
-Versatile indoor/outdoor living nestled amongst coastal gardens
-North-facing suntrap in private enclave offers year-round luxury outdoor lifestyle
-8-person Sapphire Spas swim spa; UV + ozone filtration, remote Spa Link app controlled
-Spotted Gum wharf deck, set amongst Balinese-inspired gardens
-Open plan living, kitchen & meals area leading to private covered alfresco
-SSAC & near-new Yunca wood fire integrates with zoned ducted heating & cooling fan system
-Kitchen with oversized island bench, overhead cabinetry, electric oven, induction cooktop, DW
-Central bathroom with large shower, deep relaxing bath, vanity & toilet
-North-facing Master bedroom enjoys tropical garden views, with ceiling fan, WIR & en suite
-2 additional spacious bedrooms with BIRs
-Versatile 4th bedroom/study/2nd living (with BIRs) with sliding door entrance to outdoor area
-Shady backyard with meandering path, lawn, protected Moonah tree & productive fruit trees
-Separate studio space with kitchenette, SSAC & powder room for extra living/accommodation
-Secure fencing, ample parking with double carport, garden/tool shed
-Ideal family home in coastal setting with potential for future renovation/extension (STCA)
-Freshly restored roof (resealed, new flood-proof gutters 15yr warranty)
-Peaceful no through road, with Village Park at the end of the street
-Walk to everything in exclusive seaside township
The Owner Loves.
There is nothing better than relaxing in the spa, from full sun throughout the daytime, to star gazing at night. Our aspect of towering neighbouring gums is a sight to behold. Its been a great place to raise our family, with the Village Park, playground & skate park at the end of the street.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
The Centrepoint of Convenience
Conveniently located a flat easy walk to the High Street shopping strip and with public transport options aplenty, you will not find better value in such a desirable location anywhere else!
Built to ensure energy efficiency and complete modern sophistication, this property showcases the finest fixtures and fittings such as double glazed windows, solar-boosted hot water system, stainless steel cooking appliances (incl. dishwasher), ducted heating and reverse cycle air conditioning.
The open plan living space and the bedrooms are well appointed and bathed in sensational natural light. Your master bedroom is equipped with it's own ensuite and walk in robe whilst the additional two bedrooms feature generously proportioned floor-to-ceiling built in robes and are serviced by a contemporary central bathroom with separate toilet.
If you're big on entertaining, the flow from inside to out is seamless from your living zone and you'll enjoy the simplicity of low maintenance entertaining with a sizeable courtyard with artificial turf which lends itself beautifully for those weekends with friends and family or even for the small pet to gallivant around!
Further features:
- Single remote lock up garage with internal access.
- Day/night Holland blinds throughout.
- Nearest bus stop is only 40m away.

Description:
Stylish Accommodation with a View
With prime position at the front of the block this stylish apartment showcases a modern contemporary finish with neutral tones throughout along with a magnificent view of Highton and the Barrabool Hills.
Recently refurbished with a dedication to design and a focus on craftsmanship and high quality finishes throughout the apartment provides a well thought out floor plan with an open planned living, kitchen and dining, separate bathroom, laundry and a large sized bedroom with BIR's. Harmonious, high quality finishes include:
- Caesar stone bench tops
- 2 Pac Haefele Kitchen and Forme bathroom vanity
- Stainless steel appliances
- Italian porcelain floor tiles.
Tailored for secure low maintenance living this property also has the benefits of a courtyard with a lockable gate for added privacy.
Located just around the corner from the Highton shopping/cafe precinct, only minutes' drive to High Street Belmont shopping, and easy access to public transport and the ever popular Barwon River you will not want to miss out on this niche opportunity.
This one-bedroom apartment is a great opportunity for those savvy investors looking to grow and expand their rental portfolio or first home buyers & downsizers looking to purchase in one of Geelong's most desirable suburbs. With a rental return of $315/wk the property offers a solid 5% yield.

Description:
Belmont Living On An Impressive 706m2 (approx.)!
Set upon approx. 706m2, this property presents a fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, investors, and families alike! With vehicle access to the spacious backyard, this is also an ideal choice for tradies or those looking to store caravans or trailers!
Families will appreciate that both Oberon South P.S. and Oberon High School are within easy walking distance from the front door. Public transport is also a short stroll away, along with the sporting grounds of Winter Reserve and Francis Reserve. The local shops on Francis Street are just around the corner, while both the High Street shopping precinct and Surf Coast Highway shops are within easy reach for all of your shopping and dining needs.
New carpet graces the interiors, which invite you to move straight in or to further enhance with a contemporary touch (STCA). The open plan lounge/dining zone welcomes you into the home while flowing through to the kitchen/living zone. The layout creates a wealth of space for the whole family to enjoy, with both living areas opening onto the west-facing outdoor zone. The kitchen features ample storage and brand-new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop, and 900mm rangehood.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom is complete with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with a bathroom, laundry, and separate toilet. A new ducted heating system will keep you cosy during the cooler months. The spacious backyard wraps around the south and western sides of the home - perfect for children and pets who love to roam and play! The double lock-up garage provides secure parking, plus backyard vehicle access for additional vehicle storage.
You'll need to act swiftly to secure this Belmont abode! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Established family home in quiet court.
In a small quiet court of an established neighbourhood, this charming home has been beautifully maintained, recently updated and boasts enviable versatility in indoor and outdoor living.
Classic street appeal is complimented by established landscapes at the front that invite you into a warm home. Internally, the residence comprises 4 bedrooms in total, with the front section zoned with formal living, guest room or home office and the master bedroom which includes walk in robe and ensuite. 2 additional bedrooms are zoned to the rear and serviced by a newly refurbished bathroom and separate toilet.
At the heart, the open plan layout has ducted heating, airconditioning and enjoys light filled spaces highlighting the new timber look flooring and well equipped modern kitchen boasting dishwasher, gas 900mm stove, island bench with breakfast bar and a triple pantry.
Opening from the living and dining, the outdoor entertaining capabilities of this property set it apart from the rest with a large decked area complimented by undercover alfresco, incredible established landscapes, pizza oven and numerous areas to potter, ensuring you are spoilt for choice no matter what the weather or occasion.
A paved brick courtyard steps down from the main deck creating a shaded sanctuary on a hot day, whilst an art studio / workshop / bungalow has a Coonara and adjoining storage shed.
Additional garden shedding to the rear and a remote lock up 2 car garage with rear roller door access are complimented by additional brick driveway and paths for storage of additional cars, trailers, boats or caravans.
With the close proximity to the walking and cycle tracks along the creek, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and more just a short stroll away. Schools of all levels, reserves, medical centres & Epworth Hospital are also close by, whilst the Geelong CBD and Torquay are within 15 minutes. Additionally, easy access to the train station and Ring Road make the city commute hassle free.
This property is a great example of indoor / outdoor family living and is a must to inspect if you are looking for a beautiful home in a quiet setting and a convenient location.
Call Dion Plumb on 0424 940 629 to learn more.

Description:
A wonderful home on so many levels
Youll love:
The great sense of privacy, style & sophistication throughout; from the moment you enter its lofty foyer to whenever you decide to leave.
The high cathedral ceiling above the kitchen/meals area; and how this space opens onto a large entertainers deck that captures magnificent ocean views.
The relaxed ambience of the sunken living room that features floor-to-ceiling cabinetry, plus a cosy wood fire.
The clever arrangement of bedrooms & living spaces spread out over the multiple levels, serviced with split system air conditioning and hydronic heating throughout.
Plus:
All 4 bedrooms have BIRs; including the master which is on the main level & has a large ensuite, WIR & private courtyard.
This level also has a 2nd bedroom & a powder room, the laundry with side access to the backyard & another internal staircase which leads to the double remote garage.
Bedrooms 3 & 4 are located on the top level along with a central bathroom, plus another great living area that has a balcony & ocean views!
Other quality features include a mix of solid timber finishes, exposed brick, plus the lush & private landscaped yard at the rear and much more!
Insights: 27 Strathmore Drive, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Family Living Awaits
Occupying a corner block on approx. 518m2, this home offers room to move both inside and out!
Positioned directly opposite the sporting grounds, youll love that a lush green outlook is yours to keep. Public transport is footsteps away, while a short stroll will find you at the local playground and BBQ facilities. Easy access to the Gateway Plaza and Leopold P.S. puts the practical elements in place.
With the interiors in immaculate condition, theres nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the lively hub of the home, with sliding doors opening onto both the backyard and spacious outdoor entertaining deck. This indoor-outdoor flow is perfect for modern-day living and entertaining loved ones. The kitchen features stone benchtops, a built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood). The lounge creates yet another spot to pop up your feet and relax.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom makes a statement with feature wallpaper, a walk-in robe, and en suite. Two additional bedrooms are wonderfully spacious and boast built-in robes. The main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with storage complete the functional floorplan. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Youll love relaxing under the shade of the outdoor entertaining deck, while you watch the kids play in the north-facing backyard. Children will adore the cubby house and sandpit, while the herb garden offers you an abundance of fresh ingredients. Gorgeous gardens grace both the front and backyard, with a rainwater tank promoting sustainability. Caravan and boat owners will see the potential to create side access to the backyard via Tispa Drive (STCA). The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
Showcasing immaculate interiors and gorgeous outdoor living, every inch of this home will delight! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 11 Estuary Boulevard, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Contemporary Home Abutting Reserve
Nestled in a quiet Court with a reserve right over the back fence, this spacious, modern home is ready to move into and enjoy. With reserve views and privacy from the main living area, the property is well zoned with a functional floor plan and sits on a sizeable 650m2 allotment.
Offering a superior coastal lifestyle and situated within walking distance to schools, The Dunes Shopping Village and the Quay Reserve.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Dual living spaces - upstairs and downstairs
- Four full size bedrooms
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- Brand new carpet
- Freshly painted inside and out
- Gas log fireplace
- Ducted heating throughout
- Split System heating/cooling
- Double glazing
- Three deck areas for all day enjoyment
- Secure backyard with gated access to reserve
What the VENDOR LOVES:
"We enjoy the quiet location and the ability for the kids to either play out in the quiet safe Court or out on the rear with access to the reserve. Having decks to North and South enabled us to choose where to sit and enjoy a relaxing drink, depending on the weather or what the kids are up to. The close proximity to the schools, beach, sporting grounds and in such a quiet and safe location makes this home such a joy to live in."
Internal area
287.99m²

Description:
Downsize Without Compromise
Located in one of Belmonts best streets, this beautifully updated home will have you falling in love from the moment you walk through the door. A highly desirable location, literally a stroll to Highton Village, High St shops, great schools and the gorgeous Barwon River. As you enter the home youre greeted with high ceilings and quality finishes, the home offers two good sized bedrooms the master with renovated ensuite and large dressing room or nursery while the other bedroom is serviced by the centrally located bathroom. The open kitchen is perfect for the entertainer with easy access to the to the undercover decked alfresco area with outdoor kitchenette, the perfect spot for those family gatherings. The home has hydronic heating throughout, split system A/C in the living area, and off street parking for one car. This stunning home is the perfect opportunity to enter the ever popular suburb of Belmont and would suit a downsizer or young couple.
Insights: 1/12 Hill Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 2 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.
